Articles.Content: Not a very important suggestion, but it would be nice if IVA mode in freefall showed various loose objects floating around, like sandwiches, loose nuts, pens and things like that. It would add a very nice, and Kerbal, touch to the game.

I would spend so much more time in IVA mode if this were the case.

Long as they don't overdo it offcourse
This reminded me of Surgeon Simulator space mod.
And if you could interact more in IVA in general...
